name: Awesome Waffle Brunch Food Cooking Breakfast Maker
name_original: Awesome Waffle Brunch Food Cooking Breakfast Maker
description:
Its the most important meal of the day, Breakfast Brunch! Lets make some Waffles!

Top Crazy Games is bringing you the best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite waffle recipes. Play and make your own today!

Features:
- Choose your favorite flavors: Original, Strawberry, Blueberry, Chocolate, and more
- Drag ingredients and mix with mixer
- Spray the burner with butter and pour your mix and close the burner
- Choose your toppings! Theres many of it
- EAT IT! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Shapes
- Flavors
- Decorations: Syrups, creams, candy, fruit...
- and More!!!!!

Play it for yourself.

Download Awesome Waffle Brunch Food Cooking Breakfast Maker right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Waffle Brunch Food Cooking Breakfast Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
